topic.originalTitle: Dopamine Overload: How We Got Hooked & How to Break Free
topic.refinedTitle: Dopamine Overload: Escape the Digital Addiction & Reclaim Your Focus
topic.refinedDescription: Are you constantly reaching for your phone, feeling overwhelmed by notifications and endless scrolling? This video dives into the science behind dopamine overload, revealing how modern life exploits our brain's reward system. Discover practical strategies to break free from digital addiction and regain control over your attention and well-being.
topic.targetAudience: Individuals aged 20-40, typically educated professionals, students, or creatives, who are interested in self-improvement, productivity, and mental wellness. They likely struggle with feelings of being overwhelmed, constant distraction from social media and digital devices, difficulty focusing on deep work, and a desire to build a healthier relationship with technology.
